attributes.action: create tougher sentences to those who treat domestic animals cruelly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have today heard about a blind 68 year old woman,whose guide dog was abused on the streets of Derby,those that abuse animals must face a tougher sentence to discourage the absolute cruelty and abuse of animals in this country,for some reason the moral values have deteriated,we used to be a 'animal loving' society,it is a fact that in government studies,those that abuse animals may well go on to abuse young children,one has only to recollect the stark images in the 'Sun' of a hung dalmation,a rottweiler drowned with weights about its body,the pet donkey missing in leicester,the male that killed a swan in Wales - need I go on?I ask any pet loving person in this country to petition Mr.Blair for harsh sentences for animal abuse,and to ask  for more police powers regarding this matter.

government_responses.details:
